short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to open multiple URLs at once.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time and streamline your browsing with Multi URL Opener by MageComp! This simple yet powerful Chrome extension lets you open multiple URLs simultaneously with just a click.

Why Install Multi URL Opener?
Effortless Workflow: No need to copy and paste each URL manually. Just paste a list of URLs, and they’ll open in separate tabs instantly.
Productivity Booster: Ideal for researchers, marketers, developers, or anyone who regularly works with multiple web pages.
User-Friendly Interface: A clean and intuitive design ensures a seamless experience.
Smart Validation: Automatically detects and completes missing prefixes (e.g., adding https:// if needed).
Whether you're managing SEO projects, running campaigns, or multitasking on daily tasks, Multi URL Opener is your go-to tool for efficient browsing.

Developed by MageComp – your trusted partner in digital innovation. Install now and experience the convenience!
